title: Stuck on the Reconnect page on league of legends
body: I had just finished downloading league of legends for My new MAC and when I got into champion select it took me to the reconnect page. I then Clicked on reconnect and it went to the game is still in progress screen and a second later it went back to Reconnect page. this was a repeated cycle that I tried to fix but couldn't. I'm quite sure that it's not a problem with my connection. please help me I am a Mac user.  POROCLES, BROPORO or any mod Please Help me.

replies.body: Actually this happened to me, I think it's my internet.. What I did was just reinstall, it worked after that. But if you're close to leaverbuster than you probably shouldn't take the risk.

I'm here!  I recommend sticking to custom games for now while this gets troubleshooted, but I'm curious why you feel this is not a problem with your connection.  This problem is pretty common with an unstable connection failing to reach the game server, so any details might help!  Most common issues with Macs are also related to unstable connections.  It's still really important to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in custom games to help rule out possibilities.
hey Poro can you tell me what to do please

If the steps in the guide hasn't help, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as something else might be the cause here, and our tech team can work with you directly to help resolve this.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Hey I have downloaded the tool but I don't know if it's working properly since when I I click the orange box, it has still been going on with 3 dots on the bottom part of my screen for some time.
It might be attempting to collect your logs and save them to your desktop, but might not have permission.  See if running it as admin helps.  If not, go ahead and submit a ticket anyway!

hi, there was a folder created on my Desktop called LoL Logs and when I look in it it's just a bunch of code called like ping.txt and things like that. I have also submitted a ticket and i havent been answered yet.
hey POROCLES thanks for replying I have been trying for most of the day and I can even get into a custom game with bots or training camp please help me POROCLES
Hey there!  Run through each step of that guide, progress will be made once you're able to get in!

My isp is 95 but I was told this: you haven’t racked up enough games over the last 30 days from this location for us to provide your connection score. Jump into a few matches on the Rift and check back later!
i meant i cant get into a game of custom but ill try what you said to do

Hi, this is what I found out: my isp is high at 95 and I was told this:  you haven’t racked up enough games over the last 30 days from this location for us to provide your connection score. Jump into a few matches on the Rift and check back later! but the problem is that I can't!
I have Just Tried again And it still does not work and it was a problem with my connection wouldn't I still be able to play custom games?
